name: Southern BBQ Chicken
description: Grab your BBQ Chicken & Rib Rub and officially say goodbye to dry, flavourless chicken breast. With zesty black pepper, aromatic chili powder, garlicky goodness, and a dash of fiery cayenne, these dynamic flavours will take your chicken from zero to hero. Dollop on some prepared Chipotle or Roasted Garlic Aioli!
preparation: Coat chicken breasts with BBQ Chicken & Rib Rub on both sides.
Preheat grill to medium and cook chicken with lid closed for approximately 4–6 min per side, until cooked through and chicken has reached a Food Safe internal temperature of 165° F.
Let rest for 5 min before serving.
tips: Swap chicken for 20–24 oz (600–680 g) organic tofu.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup sliced veggies, your choice and 1 cup grilled potatoes.

products.name: BBQ Chicken & Rib Rub
summary: Fire up the grill and rub the classic flavour of southern BBQ – with just a touch of sweet and mild heat – onto ribs, chicken, pork, and veggies. With flavours of chili, garlic, and paprika, this sodium-conscious blend amplifies the taste of anything you throw on the barbie!
